card.name: VW - Unable to buy credits on Vaultworks

data.text:
Shaun emailed through issues picked up @lungisaximbi @jakovanrensburg 

He's advised that he first received "Index was outside the bounds of the array", but figured it was previous CC details (card number). He replaced the full number and it went through. He was asked to insert OTP which he did, the screen just hangs at this section.
